amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to scope of research, other activities, and cooperation and coordination.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5213 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5213 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR 12/7/2006 S11381-11382; text: CR 12/7/2006 S11381-11382) To modify provisions relating to scope of research, other activities, and cooperation and coordination.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5213 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5213 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
